gen4_pokemon_12.png.name: Drifloon
gen4_pokemon_12.png.description: Drifloon is a balloon-like Pokémon that drifts along, often seen carrying small objects.

gen4_pokemon_1.png.name: Bidoof
gen4_pokemon_1.png.description: Bidoof is a hardworking Pokémon with large front teeth for gnawing on wood.

gen4_pokemon_2.png.name: Bonsly
gen4_pokemon_2.png.description: Bonsly mimics a tree to avoid predators and prefers dry environments.

gen4_pokemon_3.png.name: Bronzor
gen4_pokemon_3.png.description: Bronzor is a mysterious Pokémon often found in ruins, reflecting images on its metallic body.

gen4_pokemon_4.png.name: Buizel
gen4_pokemon_4.png.description: Buizel uses the floatation sac around its neck to stay buoyant in water.

gen4_pokemon_5.png.name: Buneary
gen4_pokemon_5.png.description: Buneary's ears are powerful enough to deliver fierce punches when threatened.

gen4_pokemon_6.png.name: Chatot
gen4_pokemon_6.png.description: Chatot mimics human speech and uses its crest to express emotions.

gen4_pokemon_7.png.name: Chimchar
gen4_pokemon_7.png.description: Chimchar is a playful Pokémon with a tail flame that never goes out.

gen4_pokemon_8.png.name: Combee
gen4_pokemon_8.png.description: Combee works diligently to collect nectar and protect its hive.

gen4_pokemon_9.png.name: Cresselia
gen4_pokemon_9.png.description: Cresselia is known as the Lunar Pokémon, bringing pleasant dreams to those around it.

gen4_pokemon_10.png.name: Croagunk
gen4_pokemon_10.png.description: Croagunk stores poison in its cheeks and delivers toxic punches to its foes.

gen4_pokemon_11.png.name: Darkrai
gen4_pokemon_11.png.description: Darkrai is a mythical Pokémon that can induce nightmares in those nearby.

gen4_pokemon_13.png.name: Finneon
gen4_pokemon_13.png.description: Finneon has glowing patterns on its fins, which it uses to attract mates.

gen4_pokemon_14.png.name: Garchomp
gen4_pokemon_14.png.description: Garchomp flies at incredible speeds to hunt its prey with razor-sharp claws.

gen4_pokemon_15.png.name: Glameow
gen4_pokemon_15.png.description: Glameow is a stylish and sneaky Pokémon, often curling its tail elegantly.

gen4_pokemon_16.png.name: Lickilicky
gen4_pokemon_16.png.description: Lickilicky's long tongue is both a weapon and a tool for grabbing objects.

gen4_pokemon_17.png.name: Lucario
gen4_pokemon_17.png.description: Lucario can sense and manipulate aura to predict its opponents' moves.

gen4_pokemon_18.png.name: Mamoswine
gen4_pokemon_18.png.description: Mamoswine is a prehistoric Pokémon with thick fur and enormous tusks.

gen4_pokemon_19.png.name: Mismagius
gen4_pokemon_19.png.description: Mismagius chants spells that can bring happiness or harm to its targets.

gen4_pokemon_20.png.name: Munchlax
gen4_pokemon_20.png.description: Munchlax loves to eat and can consume its own weight in food daily.

gen4_pokemon_21.png.name: Pachirisu
gen4_pokemon_21.png.description: Pachirisu stores electricity in its cheeks, releasing jolts when startled.

gen4_pokemon_22.png.name: Phione
gen4_pokemon_22.png.description: Phione drifts with the ocean currents, searching for warm seas.

gen4_pokemon_23.png.name: Piplup
gen4_pokemon_23.png.description: Piplup is a proud Pokémon that dislikes accepting help from others.

gen4_pokemon_24.png.name: Rampardos
gen4_pokemon_24.png.description: Rampardos uses its incredibly hard head to smash through obstacles.

gen4_pokemon_25.png.name: Roserade
gen4_pokemon_25.png.description: Roserade uses its fragrant bouquet to lure prey before delivering toxic attacks.

gen4_pokemon_26.png.name: Rotom
gen4_pokemon_26.png.description: Rotom can inhabit electrical appliances, altering its form and abilities.

gen4_pokemon_27.png.name: Shaymin
gen4_pokemon_27.png.description: Shaymin purifies polluted areas, blooming flowers wherever it goes.

gen4_pokemon_28.png.name: Shellos
gen4_pokemon_28.png.description: Shellos's appearance changes depending on the seas it inhabits.

gen4_pokemon_29.png.name: Shieldon
gen4_pokemon_29.png.description: Shieldon uses its hard, shield-like face to protect itself from attacks.

gen4_pokemon_30.png.name: Shinx
gen4_pokemon_30.png.description: Shinx's body glows when it generates electricity, intimidating foes.

gen4_pokemon_31.png.name: Snover
gen4_pokemon_31.png.description: Snover thrives in snowy mountains, blending in with the icy landscape.

gen4_pokemon_32.png.name: Starly
gen4_pokemon_32.png.description: Starly lives in flocks and communicates with its melodious chirps.

gen4_pokemon_33.png.name: Tangrowth
gen4_pokemon_33.png.description: Tangrowth extends its vine-like arms to grab prey or defend itself.

gen4_pokemon_34.png.name: Togekiss
gen4_pokemon_34.png.description: Togekiss brings blessings and spreads happiness wherever it flies.

gen4_pokemon_35.png.name: Turtwig
gen4_pokemon_35.png.description: Turtwig nourishes itself through photosynthesis using the leaf on its head.

gen4_pokemon_36.png.name: Weavile
gen4_pokemon_36.png.description: Weavile is a cunning Pokémon that uses teamwork to hunt its prey.
